vote.text: Amendment SA 4076 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4076 proposed by Senator Perdue. (consideration: CR S7453-7454; text: CR S7453) To amend the preamble.

Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4076 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
